net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Util_checkVersion
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Given a version, a minimum version, and an optional maximum version, return
true (1) when the version is valid and false (0) when out of bounds.

arg(0) = version
arg(1) = minimum required version
arg(2) = (Optional) maximum required version

Valid version formats:
1 = coerced to 1.0
1.0 = Major version 1, minor 0
2.5 = Major version 2, minor 5
2.3v1 = Invalid and will result in an error
